column1: #Text=Everybody wanted to know what the blog was and what the Vizinho 's blog was , since the spread about it in traditional media was big .
#Text=At present time it is usually only the people reading political blogs and anything else .
#Text=Many blogs have appeared since the " Vizinho do Jefferson " blog , every important journalist from the country has a blog today ; however they are just starting .

column1: #Text=Do you think that Brazilian media has been controlled by Workers Party sympathizers ?
#Text=Very good question .
#Text=Yes .
#Text=Several times the Brazilian media has been controlled by Workers Party sympathizers when the party was not in power .
#Text=At present time , journalists are a littile lost and they are not able to talk about the insanity in Lula 's government .
#Text=The Brazilian press have covered the scandal with a lot of detail .
#Text=Did it redeem itself ?
#Text=But in this case you have the blog influence over the press .
#Text=How can you not write about it if someone else is talking about the subject ?
#Text=Brazilian politics in general
#Text=What , if any , are your political affiliations , and do they influence the material you choose to include in your blog ?
#Text=Yes , I am from the Green Party .
#Text=It does n't influence my work ; on the contrary , my work influenced my political life .
#Text=Have you run for a political post ?
#Text=The national president of my party asked me to be federal deputy candidate in the next elections .
#Text=I have been with the national executive of the Green Pary this year — before the blog — asking for a moratorium on the deforestation exploitation .
#Text=I 've always been a very active environmentalist .
#Text=Are Brazilian politicians more corrupt now than before ?
#Text=I think that they are less discreet .
#Text=Politics and corruption walk together in any country of the world .
#Text=There are many interests involved in any part of the planet .
#Text=The scandal
#Text=Political scandals like this have happened before in Brazil ?
#Text=Not at this proportion .
#Text=The volume of money involved is huge .
#Text=The problem is that the 3 Brazilian powers : Legislative , Executive and Judicial were exposed to the population .
#Text=Every Ministry had problems of inefficiency and the ruling party , which always represented the ethics and morals , was caught literally with dollars inside his underwear .
#Text=( laughs )
#Text=How far does the corruption go ?
#Text=Does it [ the crisis ] continue ?
#Text=The crisis will continue , sure , there are a lot of things that must be explained .
#Text=The great doubt is if Lula knew or not .
#Text=Sure , he knew about the existence of the bribery of parliamentarians by the government using the scheme called " mensalão " .
